p: For quantitative kinetic analysis of EPL release profiles from optimized NEs and NE liquisolids, KinetDS 3.0 (Aleksander Mendyk, GNU GPLv3 license, 2007, Krak√≥w, Poland) software was used to investigate the best data fit according to zero order, first order, Higuchi, Korsmeyer-Peppas, and Weibull diffusion models.
